greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(A080147(n)) = A080148(n), a(A080148(n)) = A080147(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, if prime(n) mod 4 = 1, then a(n) = A080148(A267097(n)), otherwise a(n) = A080147(A267098(n)).
xref: Cf. also A267107 (a more recursed variant).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 01 2016
